name: Version 1.8.6
body:
### Changelog
- Add confirmation dialogs
- Add shortcuts
- Fix about screen
- Add EDL shortcut
- Fix crash on not rooted devices

name: Version 1.8.5

### Changelog
- Add confirmation dialogs
- Add shortcuts
- Fix about screen
- Add EDL shortcut

name: Version 1.8.4
body:
### Changelog
- Add German translations
- Add Dutch translations
- Improve about screen

name: Version 1.7.1
body:
### Changelog
- Enabled minification and shrinking
- Moved to androidx preferences

name: Version 1.7
body:
### Changelog
- New about activity
- Available on the Play Store

name: Version 1.6.1
body:
### Changelog
- Activate qs tiles on boot
- Fix navigation bar color

name: Version 1.6
body:
### Changelog
- New dark and black themes
- Ability to move the app to an SD card
- New quick settings tile for restarting the system UI

name: Version 1.5
body:
### Changelog
- New Android 9-like theme
- Navigation bar color now changes with the theme
- New settings page

name: Version 1.4
body:
### Changelog
- Recents color gets updated on theme change
- About dialog changes with theme
- App now uses vectors instead of bitmaps

name: Version 1.3
body:
### Changelog
- Changed general style
- Added ability to restart system UI

name: Version 1.1
